content: newish kiselyov et al paper -- https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.15768. could be interesting as part of a stream-processing system built in components. i wonder if it has applications when composing components, can one fuse across component boundaries... maybe as part of a toolchain
Ralph has marked this topic as unresolved.

the other day, I vibe coded a rust implmentation of this paper using the ocaml impl repo as a test regime, and compiled that out to components as well. If anyone wants to see it, I can push it. Haven't used it, but it was fun.....
@Andy Wingo :point_up:
